assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Perdoceo Education Corporation provides postsecondary education to student through online, campus based, and blended learning programs in the United States. It operates through two segments, Colorado Technical University and American InterContinental University. The company offers academic programs in the career-oriented disciplines of business and management, nursing, healthcare management, computer science, engineering, information systems and technology, project management, cybersecurity, criminal justice, education, and health sciences. It also operates intellipath, a personalized learning platform; and mobile application and two-way messaging platform. As of December 31, 2020, the company had a total student enrollment of approximately 42,700 students. The company was formerly known as Career Education Corporation and changed its name to Perdoceo Education Corporation in January 2020. Perdoceo Education Corporation was incorporated in 1994 and is headquartered in Schaumburg, Illinois.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Jeffrey D. Ayers
companyOfficers.title: Sr. VP, Gen. Counsel & Corp. Sec.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. John R. Kline
companyOfficers.title: Sr. VP of American Intercontinental University

companyOfficers.name: Ms. Virginia  Carpenter
companyOfficers.title: Managing Director of Gibbs Division and VP of Gibbs Division

companyOfficers.name: Ms. Deborah A. Snyder
companyOfficers.title: Chief Academic Officer for Career Schools Group
